QuestData.Title: Our Boys on the Shore
QuestData.Description: The situation here in the Highlands changes by the minute. Our objective is to storm the Bastion of Twilight, but I can't even secure a landing zone on the shore without the blasted Horde creating trouble.$B$BWhile I scrape together the remains of the fleet, I need men on the shore securing the beach head.$B$BReport to Lieutenant Emry on the shore and help his marines to beat back the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Lieutenant Emry at the Twilight Shores in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Lieutenant Emry at the Twilight Shores in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Keep your head down 'fore you lose it, $c!$B$BThis is MY beach.$B$BThe Horde WANTS my beach.$B$BThey will NOT have my beach.$B$BIs the beach situation clear?
